items.content_html: Lightning fast, robust SaaS product for your web automation requirements. Take advantage of Headless Browser Automation on the cloud with great scalability. items.content_html: UE Auth is a multi-tenant OIDC Provider, User Management, B2B Product Access, and Roles/Permissions Management system intended to create a single hybrid solution to serve as Identity and Access for both self-registered B2C Apps and Enterprise B2B Solutions. The feature set combines similar functionality you find in Commercial SaaS providers for Identity Management at far less cost, and provides all of the missing pieces enterprises typically end up having to develop on their own in a single package available to your organization through an Apache 2.0 license.
items.title: UnitedEffects/ueauth: UE Auth is a multi-tenant OIDC Provider, User Management, B2B Product Access, and Roles/Permissions Management system intended to create a single hybrid solution to serve as Identity and Access for both self-registered B2C Apps and Enterprise B2B Solutions. The feature set combines similar functionality you find in Commercial SaaS providers for Identity Management at far less cost, and provides all of the missing pieces enterprises typically end up having to develop on their own in a single package available to your organization through an Apache 2.0 license.
